DOC.brief_title: Long-Term Efficacy Safety Aflibercept Intravitreal Injections Treatment Diabetic Macular Edema
DOC.detailed_description: The Endurance3 Trial Phase IV open label study assess need ongoing intravitreal aflibercept injection 3 year VISTA DME ( VGFT-OD-1009 ) endpoint . Subjects treat intravitreal aflibercept injection pro nata ( PRN ) upon presence CR-DME ( Clinically Relevant DME ) note OCT ( Optical Coherence Tomography ) image examination . In addition , subject meet re-treatment criterion eligible focal laser treatment every 90 day .
